fields.name: ActionGroupResourceId
fields.description: Action group resource id used by digest.

fields.name: Categories
fields.description: Categories to send digest for. If categories are not provided, then digest will be sent for all categories.

fields.name: Frequency
fields.description: Frequency that digest will be triggered, in days. Value must be between 7 and 30 days inclusive.

fields.name: Language
fields.description: Language for digest content body. Value must be ISO 639-1 code for one of Azure portal supported languages. Otherwise, it will be converted into one. Default value is English (en).

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of digest configuration. Value is case-insensitive and must be unique within a subscription.
